What is the name of the federal program that provides education benefits to military veterans?
oriSent: The GI Bill is a federal program that provides education benefits to military veterans who served on active duty for at least 90 days after September 10, The program offers several types of benefits, including the Montgomery GI Bill (MGIB) and the Post-9/11 GI Bill.
